mapper.insert: INSERT INTO goods (g_id, g_name, g_desc, g_price, g_originalPrice, g_pic1, g_pic2, g_pic3, g_state, g_updateTime, g_t_id, g_u_id) VALUES (#{g_id}, #{g_name}, #{g_desc}, #{g_price}, #{g_originalPrice}, #{g_pic1}, #{g_pic2}, #{g_pic3}, #{g_state}, #{g_updateTime}, #{g_type.t_id}, #{g_user.u_id})
mapper.select: SELECT g_id, g_name, g_desc, g_price, g_originalPrice, g_pic1, g_pic2, g_pic3, g_updateTime, g_state, g_like, g_t_id, u_id AS g_u_id, u_nick AS g_u_nick, u_photo AS g_u_photo, u_sex AS g_u_sex FROM goods, users WHERE g_u_id = u_id AND g_state = 0 ORDER BY g_updateTime DESC LIMIT #{startPos}, #{pageSize}

SELECT g_id, g_name, g_desc, g_price, g_originalPrice, g_pic1, g_pic2, g_pic3, g_updateTime, g_state, g_like, g_t_id, u_id AS g_u_id, u_nick AS g_u_nick, u_photo AS g_u_photo, u_sex AS g_u_sex FROM goods, users, likegoods WHERE lg_u_id = #{u_id} AND lg_g_id = g_id AND g_u_id = u_id ORDER BY g_updateTime DESC
SELECT g_id, g_name, g_desc, g_price, g_originalPrice, g_pic1, g_pic2, g_pic3, g_updateTime, g_state, g_like, g_t_id FROM goods WHERE g_u_id = #{u_id} AND g_state != 4 ORDER BY g_updateTime DESC
